name: The Last Sentinel (2024)
description:
Studio Lightspeed LA Presented The Last Sentinel - a new futuristic action game. The announcement won at The Game Awards 2023.

Lighspeed Studios is based on Steve S. Martin, a former Rockstar employee who worked on series such as Grand Theft Auto and Red Dead Redemption. The developers promise immersive storytelling and a creative approach to history. The plot of The Last Guardian centers on Hiromi Shoda, a warrior in future Tokyo. It is known that the game was created on Unreal Engine 5, the trailer is a pre-render.
